name: Nyan's Revenge
description:
PROTOTYPE for our 1st Shooter Game by 3 Game Dev Student - 1st year.
Made with Unity in 3 Weeks.

<!!> CONTROLS <!!>

-> Use the 4 keyboard ARROWS to move [Top-Down ; Right-Left] -> Hold SPACE to SHOOT. -> Press ESCAPE to PAUSE

Looking for a maximum feedback, advices, reports.  Also, tell us your best score !

Project Leader : Eloys "Nahilys" DONNET

Lead Programmer : Eloys "Nahilys" DONNET

Game Designers : Sylvain SANESTI, Eloys "Nahilys" DONNET

Level Designer : Sylvain SANESTI

UI / FX Programmer : Kevin MOUTTE

Sprites Artist & Animations : Janosch Stober

Twitter : https://twitter.com/Nahilys_ // https://twitter.com/LekasoftStudio
